Amulet of the Dead

miscellaneous (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 318
spell [itemspell]: #875 Animate Skeleton
leadership (undead) [ldr-u]: +5
reanimation bonus (holy) [reanimH]: 2
reanimation bonus (death) [reanimD]: 2

Requires 5D to forge (D1)

This amulet is made of a green turquoise and will enhance its user's effectiveness at raising the dead. It is commonly used by necromancers and undead priests. The creation of permanent Ghouls, Longdead, and Soulless is enhanced by this amulet.
